overview: Ghostbusters II Electronic Press Kit is an Electronic Press Kit (EPK), a videocassette sent to various media outlets (like TV News programs) for them to use to promote Ghostbusters II with trailers, film clips, making of featurette, cast and crew interviews, behind the scenes footage, and so on. It is also famous for containing rare alternate takes, extended scenes and deleted scenes from the movie.
title: Ghostbusters II Electronic Press Kit
